question:
[Timothy] bought gifts for his lovely sister, [Connie] [William] took his daughter [Christine] to the baseball game. [Christine]'s brother [Timothy] hates baseball and stayed home. [Connie] and her aunt, [Dorothy], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami.
Question: How is [Dorothy] related to [William]?
